name: TestcaseinDesignState
wiql: select [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [System.Title], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [System.Tags] from WorkItems where [System.TeamProject] = @project and [System.WorkItemType] = 'Test Case' and [System.State] <> '' and [System.AreaPath] = '$projectId$\App Development Team'
